Chapter Previous Next

gstSetPhantomForce

int gstSetPhantomForce( int id , const gstVector& force , const gstVector& torque ) ;

Sends a force to the Phantom motors. Use this version for 6dof. The force vector is cartesian forces, the torque vector is joint torques for the 6dof axes.

Declared in header file: gstDeviceIO.h
